title: FileNotFoundError Example
description: Demonstrate a FileNotFoundError (opening a non-existent file).
instructions:
Run the code. You should see:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "file_not_found_error.py", line 1, in <module>
    open('file_that_does_not_exist.txt')
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'file_that_does_not_exist.txt'
```
